Dialogue.Page: Mod: Solar Rangers Authors: Hawkbar, Insmoshable
Solar Rangers is the mod that won third place in the third mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.
The mod takes a complete unexpected turn for an Outer Wilds mod, turning the open-world space exploration game into a space warfare game.
While Solar Rangers isn't exactly "Outer Wilds-y", it's quite fun and does something incredibly creative.
